metadata.description: Plans for the Navy’s new experimental fighter sub have been stolen and put up for sale to the highest bidder. Clay Olsen, an ex-SEAL turned hydro-plane racer, is drafted to pilot the Navy’s latest prototype sub on a mission to retrieve the plans and stop the fighters from falling into the wrong hands at any cost. It’s high octane, high pressure excitement at fifty fathoms…
metadata.name: Supersonic
